Jinzhen Zhu

37 Theresienstrasse · Munich Germany, 80333 · +4915908457541· zhujinzhenlmu@gmail.com

I am with a mixed background.
I am now a Ph.D student of LMU with research interest in computational physics with experience in data analysis and computational software development and application using Python and C++.
I have work experiences in web development with javascript and Python.
I obtained my master degree majored in quantum chemistry.

Research

Computational Physics

Application and development with the tRecX code using C++ and Python, including

Implementation of parallelization and spectrum evaluation part of tRecX.

Frustrated double ionization of HeH + .

Double photoelectron emission from He atoms by intense laser pulses.

Dissociative ionization of H 2 + in full dimensionality.

July 2016 - Present

Quantum Chemistry

Quantum-Chemistry calculation by Gauss and VASP

Catalysts screening in lithium-air batteries by first-principles calculation.

Quantum chemistry calculation of 3D-to-planar structural transition of clusters.

Investigation the catalytic mechanism of catalyst for NO oxidation at low content.

September 2013 - June 2015
